&reftitle.install;
To be able to use the functions defined in this module you must compile your PHP interpreter using the configure line --with-iconv[=DIR].
Note to Win32 Users
In order to enable this module on a Windows environment, you need to put a DLL file named iconv.dll or iconv-1.3.dll (prior to 4.2.1) which is bundled with the PHP/Win32 binary package into a directory that is specified by the PATH environment variable or one of the system directories of your windows installation.
